Package net.ssehub.comani.core

Class Logger

java.lang.Object
net.ssehub.comani.core.Logger
public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to print different types of information to the console.
Author:
Christian Kroeher

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Logger.LogLevel
    This enumeration defines the different log levels.
    static class  Logger.MessageType
    This enumeration defines the different types of messages.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Logger getInstance()
    Return the single instance of the Logger.
    void log​(java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String description, Logger.MessageType type)
    Prints the given information to the console.
    void logException​(java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable throwable)
    Prints the given Throwable and its cause(s) as an error message to the console.
    void setLogLevel​(java.lang.String newLogLevel)
    Sets the new Logger.LogLevel for this logger based on the given log level number to increase or reduce the amount of information logged and displayed on the console.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Logger getInstance()
      Return the single instance of the Logger.
      Returns:
      the single instance of the Logger

    • setLogLevel

      public void setLogLevel​(java.lang.String newLogLevel)
      Sets the new Logger.LogLevel for this logger based on the given log level number to increase or reduce the amount of information logged and displayed on the console. For the current mapping of log level and associated numbers see Logger.LogLevel.
      Parameters:
      newLogLevel - the new log level number as a string

    • log

      public void log​(java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String description, Logger.MessageType type)
      Prints the given information to the console. This includes formating the given message and description texts via formatLogText(String, String).
      Parameters:
      origin - the name of the class calling this method; should never be null
      message - the message to be displayed; should never be null
      description - optional description; can be null
      type - the Logger.MessageType of this message; should never be null

    • logException

      public void logException​(java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      Prints the given Throwable and its cause(s) as an error message to the console.
      Parameters:
      origin - the name of the class calling this method; should never be null
      message - a custom error message displayed before the throwable message and its cause(s); can be null
      throwable - the exception to be displayed; can be null
